reviewText:
First saw the R rated versions of the film. Really enjoyed it.
Alot better than Johnny Depp half assed actting job.
Evan Stone ,Jesse Jane, Carmen Luvana and others
did an outstanding job doing the movie. It was even better
when I got the X rated version of the movie. And now I have it
on blu ray. This is #3 pick as best adult feature.

This movie is excellent! Even if you are not into this kind of movie (Rated X) it's still a great movie to watch. It isn't just an X-rated film, it's a movie as well.  And it is pretty funny too if you actually listen to the dialogue.
